headline.main: A Diet Doctor Comes to Dinner; When a Diet Doctor Comes to Dinner

docs.abstract: Article on how hostesses and guests are swayed by presence of diet drs at dinner parties; drawing (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: DR. HOWARD SHAPIRO was asked by a stranger seated next to him at a recent buffet dinner what he did professionally. When he told her that he specialized in helping obese patients lose weight, she looked at the suze of the serving before her and explained apologetically, "This plate is for me and my husband."
